document.full_text: berkshire hathaway   is looking at two large acquisitions on the scale of its $9 billion cash purchase of chemical company lubrizol corp , berkshire chief executive warren buffett said on saturday.
document.title: berkshire looking at two large deals: buffett
lines_and_colors: berkshire hathaway   is looking at two large acquisitions on the scale of its $9 billion cash purchase of chemical company lubrizol corp , berkshire chief executive warren buffett said on saturday.
